jcr:content.jcr:description: Centre offers veterinary services, dog training, pet boarding for dogs and cats, and more services. Book now!

title.jcr:title: Building lasting relationships with our clients & their pets!

richtext.text: We Love Your Dogs Like Our Own!

button_copy_copy.jcr:title: Book On Our App
button_copy_copy.buttonImageAltText: Book Your Pet's Stay On the Yourgi App

title.jcr:title: Welcome to Centre - The Premier Destination for Pets!

richtext.text: Allow us to take this opportunity to personally invite you to join our pack, where your pet is treated like family. With a wide range of services, our dedicated team of experts strive to provide a very special home away from home for your precious pup or feline. You can count on our compassionate care to keep your dog’s tail wagging! It’s our promise to you -- hand in hand, paw in paw.

Destination Pet is a fully comprehensive Veterinary Hospital specializing in pet daycare, boarding, and full service grooming. We offer the peace of mind and convenience you’ll come to expect from our warm, loving staff.

Whether your pet is due for their annual wellness exam, wants to join us for fun-filled day, or needs a spa day, we strive to offer all of the services your pet needs under one woof. Rest assured we cater to all of your needs, providing exceptional veterinary care, the best in doggie daycre, luxury boarding, and even exotic pet borading along with top-of-the-line dog grooming services.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

richtext_copy.text: Centre is a fully comprehensive Veterinary Hospital with a wide array of serivces from wellness and prevenative care, to dentistry and surgeries, we are equipped to handle all of your beloved companion's veterinary care needs to keep your pets happy and healthy.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

richtext_copy_copy.text: Transform your dog into the envy of the neighborhood with a rejuvenating visit to the Dog Grooming Spa at Destination Pet of City. Our skilled staff, with training and experience, caters to all breeds, ensuring each customer receives a premium spa treatment for their beloved furry companions.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

Are you seeking an enjoyable space for your dog to spend the day in playful activities? Our Dog Daycare program provides a fun and convenient option for pet owners in the southwest, offering your dog a day filled with exciting playtime and socialization under the supervision of our trained and caring staff.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

richtext_copy.text: At Centre we understand your deep affection for your dogs and your desire for them to experience a home-like environment even when you're away. Our Dog Boarding accommodations go beyond the ordinary, offering lavish suites that provide a pampering experience for your beloved pets, ensuring they feel as if they're on a well-deserved vacation of their own.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

richtext_copy_copy.text: Centre is in the process of developing a training program, to be announced. Check out our sister facility, K-9 Coach, for your training needs at this time.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

We believe your cats deserve nothing less than extraordinary care, especially when you're away. In our Cat Boarding accommodations, we go above and beyond to treat your feline companions like the true stars they are. With an emphasis on pampering and love, our luxurious facilities ensure that your beloved cats feel cherished and valued during their stay with us.

infocards_copy_copy_.description: The next time you are traveling, we hope you will trust Brown Dog Lodge to be your dog’s home away from home.
infocards_copy_copy_.title: Boarding

richtext.text: Preventative care with wellness and vaccination programs, surgical services, and emergency veterinary services.

While many facilities only offer a handful of services, Centre is truly a one-stop-shop for our guests. We take the time to personally get to know our clients and their pets, forming personal relationships with everyone who enters our facility. When you choose our award winning boarding or doggy daycare services, you can feel confident knowing that your companion will be in excellent hands while you’re away. You can also relax knowing that your cuddly friend will have a great time and receive plenty of love and affection from our compassionate staff.

Our world-class veterinarian takes great pride in delivering high-quality services intended to keep your pets happy and healthy. From routine care to treatment for injuries and illnesses, we are equipped to handle all of your beloved companion’s veterinary care needs.

richtext.text: Our pet care team is always in sync…We’re talking, listening, and caring, together. We work as one to make sure your pet always gets the care she needs, so you don’t need to worry.

title.jcr:title: Veterinary Hospital and Pet Care Services in City

richtext.text: If you are searching for a veterinarian or are in need of pet boarding in City, trust Destination Pet. We are passionate about doing everything we can to ensure the health and happiness of our clients and guests, and we are honored to be entrusted with your pet’s care.
